ValidationRule.description: To throw an error if VAT status was changed from/To to Confirmed OR Not applicable by any user other that finance for EMEA opporutnities. Initial creation : GTMS-16026, GTMS-16027 GTMS-28416: Added a condition CurrencyIsoCode = 'MXN' to include Mexico
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode,'EUR'), ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode,'GBP'), ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode,'MXN') ), ISCHANGED(VAT_Validation_Status__c), OR( ISPICKVAL(VAT_Validation_Status__c,'Confirmed'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(VAT_Validation_Status__c),'Confirmed'), ISPICKVAL(VAT_Validation_Status__c,'Not Applicable'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(VAT_Validation_Status__c),'Not Applicable') ), CASESAFEID($Profile.Id) != '00e1a000000dxEqAAI',/*System Admin API*/ CASESAFEID($Profile.Id) != '00e1a000000UoNcAAK',/*System Admin*/ CASESAFEID($Profile.Id) != '00e1a000000i8JHAAY',/*Samsara Finance*/ CASESAFEID($Profile.Id) != '00e4p000001FKPaAAO',/*Samsara Finance Admin*/ NOT(Bypass_Validation_rule__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The VAT Validation Status can only be updated by Finance
